snippet.title: Heaven's Vault - official trailer
snippet.description:
History is the story in Heaven's Vault.  Uncover thousands of years' worth of history by finding artefacts, discovering new sites, and deciphering ancient inscriptions in this branching, narrative-driven adventure game. Your discoveries about the past will change the future - but will the history you put together, be the truth?
 
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/774201/Heavens_Vault/
PS4 - https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP3273-CUSA11824_00-HEAVENSVAULTGAME

Find out more: http://www.inklestudios.com/heavensvault

Voice of Aliya - Gem Carmella

Music composed by Laurence Chapman and performed by Leos Strings 
http://www.laurencechapman.com/
Soundtrack - https://laurencechapman.bandcamp.com/album/heavens-vault-official-soundtrack
https://leos-strings.com/
